entry.title: It's a weird life, but it's where i'm at right now…
entry.summary:
Author: salenora

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,829Chapters: 11/30Kudos: 228

Summary: Buck goes back to the 118 after the lawsuit. The team forgives him and work feels normal again. But outside the firehouse, no one invites him out. Buck feels lonely. One night he finds a new bar called the Griffin. There, he meets some new friends. Buck also learns he is going to be a dad. Or,Buck and Jess sleep together - and Jess gets pregnant. entry.title: Buckley's Chance
entry.summary:
Author: RaspberryDreams1

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 39,701Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 384

Summary: Evan knows that wish babies are extremely rare, the Fae only grant a handful of wishes per year and almost never to single parents. But Evan so desperately wants a family to love that he’s been subconsciously wishing since he was a teenager. Eddie hadn’t thought of wishing for a baby, he had barely heard of wish babies or soulmates, his parents didn’t believe in such things. Eddie desperately wanted a place for him and his son to belong, a family that would accept him without demanding that he change who he was to fit their impossibly unrealistic expectations.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 108,311Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 31

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 93,639Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,571Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: But I Hate Being Comfortable
entry.summary:
Author: serenelystrange

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,297Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 161

Summary: “You’re being so weird about this,” Eddie says. “We’ve shared a bed before.” *Not when I was consciously in love with you*, Buck thinks but doesn’t say. “And even if you don’t want to share, we can at least take turns,” Eddie continues. *I will fuck your pillows, Edmundo.*OR - Buck swears the couch is more comfortable than Eddie's bed in an effort to avoid sharing the bed with the best friend he's hopelessly in love with. Eddie responds by deciding they need to buy a better mattress.

entry.title: it's all wrong (it's alright)
entry.summary:
Author: emonlispenardstreet

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 113,768Chapters: 14/17Kudos: 109

Summary: The player reaches Bobby and ducks his head to tug off his helmet.  He flexes his fingers as he comes to a stop, and Buck freezes.Even before Bobby says it, he knows who it is. He’d know that hand movement anywhere.“Eddie Diaz, it’s good to see you again.”“You too, Coach. Glad to have you join us.”Bobby looks around at the other UT Austin players gathered before them. "Before I get to know you guys, I wanted to introduce you to a new member of the team - Buck, come up here.”Eddie’s eyes follow Bobby’s gaze across the players, a jovial smile on his face, but when his eyes drift to Buck they widen back with lightning speed and his smile disappears. “Evan?”  Shit.   Or: Buck and Eddie met as teens one summer at 118 Football Training Camp - but they haven't spoken since. Several years later, in their final year of college, Eddie meets UT Austin's newest recruit: Evan Buckley.

entry.title: Buck, Bothered, and Bisexual
entry.summary:
Author: 1dalso

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,605Chapters: 10/10Kudos: 52

Summary: It’s as if time slows down, or the world comes to an abrupt halt. Not only is this guy probably the same age as Buck, but fuck. This might just be the hottest guy he’s ever seen— and he likes girls. "Phew! That’s one fine man,” whistles Hen from the kitchen, sidling up besides Chimney, “And I like girls.” Buck eagerly nods in agreement, because who’s he kidding, he likes girls too. But hey, attraction is each to their own, and he finds whatever this is, quite attractive. He can unpack that later. Preferably at home. Maybe with a beer. Or two. — Buck and Eddie meet for the first time on the cusp of Buck's bisexual awakening. How much of the newbie, Eddie Diaz, can Buck handle before he takes matters into his own hands... and maybe gives those matters a kiss on the mouth?

entry.title: Happier Than Ever
entry.summary:
Author: stonyismyotp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,599Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 107

Summary: "It’s Dr. Wells. The Dr. Wells Bobby had sent Buck to, over a year and a half ago. The same one he couldn’t quite admit had taken advantage of him, had made him feel numb whenever he tried sharing his feelings, who made it impossible to open up to any other therapist— She was there and she had a baby. A baby who couldn’t be more than ten months old. A baby with his blonde hair and bright blue eyes, not her dark hair and dark eyes." or Dr. Wells had a baby & never told Buck. - title from the song by billie eilish pls heed the tags, & i'll be putting warnings at the beginning of each chapter, this is going to be a relatively heavy fic (tho it will be focused on recovery) so pls prioritize your own mental health.

entry.title: Crimson Red
entry.summary:
Author: shadowtvwrites

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,727Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 418

Summary: “Woah! Hey Buck… it’s just me!” Ravi responded with a wavering tone, still in a bit of disbelief at the other man’s state. Eddie looked down at the crimson smear across his vest, sticky on his fingers from where he’d checked the paint.  Oh. The red did look a lot like blood.  OR The 118 gets a call to a paintball arena. Things derail quickly when Eddie gets shot by one of the players with a paintball gun.

entry.title: A soulmate who wasn't meant to be
entry.summary:
Author: JamieNimbus

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,789Chapters: 7/10Kudos: 18

Summary: When his abuela and tía Pepa suggested taking him and his sisters on vacation with their cousins the last place he expected them to end up was Hershey, PA. Sure, the cold and snow was a nice change to the blistering heat and desert that came from El Paso but seriously? This place was a ghost town. Or the one where Eddie is allowed to finally act like a dumb kid and not a parent. A mysterious pretty boy helps him realise things about himself.

entry.title: The Dance We Never Finished
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,009Chapters: 29/29Kudos: 29

Summary: Evan Robert Nash never talked about what happened in Texas. Not the music Not the dancing. Not even about Sean Edmundo Diaz.Back in L.A Evan built a life worth living firefighter Lieutenant maybe even future Captain. But fate has a cruel sense of humor. Because Sean Diaz just walked into his world and this time he isn't leaving quietly.Now Evan must face the one person who knows what happened in Texas .and decide whether to keep running from the past or let it burn into the future.

entry.title: you could be my baby, baby, baby
entry.summary:
Author: Elgney

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,277Chapters: 1/9Kudos: 170

Summary: “My mom said, uh, that his name was Buck. That he was going to go to the fire academy and that he had a—” she broke off, rubbing her own forehead, exactly where his skin went pink. “She said he went by Firehose.” Buck didn’t need all of his coworkers to look at him in alarm; he was pretty sure he’d gone deadly pale. His daughter knew four things about him, and one of them was his old tinder profile handle. He felt a little like he was going to die. “She’s got your eyes,” Eddie commented, unhelpfully. ---- Buck finds out he has a daughter, and also a stupidly big crush on his best friend. It's an adjustment.
